title: You and I
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 35 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: You and I presents many ways young children have fun together in a park. Familiar actions, such as swinging, sliding, biking, and running, are used to tell the story. Predictable sentence patterns, rhyme, and pictures support students as they read.
meta: dance, fun, hike, ride, slide, swing
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Pronouns : Recognize and understand the word I as a pronoun
High-Frequency Words : Recognize, write, and understand the meaning of the high-frequency word and

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
